verse.name: c1a
c1b
v1a
verse.lines:
What can wash away
my sin?
Nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
What can make me
whole again?
Nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
For my pardon
this I see:
nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
For my cleansing
this my plea:
nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Nothing can
for sin atone:
nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Naught of good
that I have done:
nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
This is all
my hope and peace:
nothing but
the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
This is all
my righteousness:
nothing but
the blood of Jesus.
